text: "Memories" is a 2009 song by French DJ David Guetta featuring American rapper Kid Cudi and is the fourth single from his fourth studio album One Love. It topped the single charts in Belgium. It went to top 10 in Australia, Austria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Poland, Romania and Switzerland. It also peaked at number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 18 in Canada and number 46 in the United States. == Track listing == * UK CD single #"Memories" – 3:28 #"Memories" (Fuck Me I'm Famous Remix) – 6:06 * French CD single #"Memories" – 3:28 #"Memories" (Extended) – 5:20 #"Memories" (Fuck Me I'm Famous Remix) – 6:06 == References == Category:2009 songs Category:David Guetta songs
title: Memories (David Guetta song)
